strapiEdition.headline: Hogs to Host the Vols at Home

posts.title: Arkansas Razorbacks Non-Conference Schedule
posts.content:
Arkansas Mens Basketball team announces their non-conference schedule for the 20-21 season.

  • Info - Their opener begins November 25 at home hosting Mississippi Valley State. Other notable games include University of Central Arkansas on December 12 and Oklahoma State on January 30, 2021.
  • A full schedule can be found HERE
  • 2020-2021 season looks fun

posts.title: CBMAA: North Forest Lights
posts.content:
The North Forest Lights Exhibits returns for a second season.

  • "Enjoy an enchanted nighttime walk through the woods featuring dynamic, nature-inspired lighting elements, and immersive soundscapes. Five distinct installations will bring the soul of the forest to life with light, sound, and sensory effects in a captivating, family-friendly experience. North Forest Lights will be open in the evening hours after sunset.
    " CBMAA
  • Info - This year's exhibit comes with extended dates and new safety measures. Tickets can be purchased ahead of time at a discount. More information can be found HERE

posts.title: New Grant Opportunity for Small Businesses
posts.content:
A new direct grant opportunity is available to small businesses in Arkansas operating in the personal care, tourism, travel, recreation, hospitality or related industries.

  • The event will take place on November 10 afternoon. Applications will be accepted Nov. 16-25 by the ASBTDC, Arkansas Small Business & Technology Development Center in Fayetteville
  • Deep Dive - More information on the specific event be found HERE
  • Other small business events can be found HERE
